languages.text: "Меня несколько раз перевозили с места на места, но что это за места, я сказать не могу. Я видел шпили в океане тумана, я видел нутро друкарского корабля... Один раз мне удалось почти вырваться — ксеносы как огня боятся сил варпа. Я едва не преуспел..." {n}Хейнрикс трясет головой.{/n} "Возможно, я скажу ересь, но, похоже, только из-за Гемункула, забравшего меня сюда, я и остался в живых, когда меня свалили в том бою. Потом — это место, этот гроб... и боль".

"They moved me multiple times from one place to another, but what those places were, I cannot say. I saw spires in an ocean of mist; I saw the bowels of a Drukhari ship... I almost broke free once: few things frighten the xenos as much as warp powers. I was close..." {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "One might consider my words heretical, but I would say it was only due to the Haemonculus who brought me here that I survived after falling in that struggle. From there it was just this place, this coffin... and pain."
languages.original_text: "Меня несколько раз перевозили с места на места, но что это за места, я сказать не могу. Я видел шпили в океане тумана, я видел нутро друкарского корабля... Один раз мне удалось почти вырваться — ксеносы как огня боятся сил варпа. Я едва не преуспел..." {n}Хейнрикс трясет головой.{/n} "Возможно, я скажу ересь, но, похоже, только из-за Гемункула, забравшего меня сюда, я и остался в живых, когда меня свалили в том бою. Потом — это место, этот гроб... и боль".

traits.locale_text: "They moved me multiple times from one place to another, but what those places were, I cannot say. I saw spires in an ocean of mist, I saw the bowels of a Drukhari ship... I almost broke free one time — few things frighten the xenos as much as warp powers. I was close..." {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "One might consider my words heretical, but I would say it was only because of the Haemonculus who took me here that I stayed alive after falling in that scuffle. From there it was just this place, this coffin... and pain."

From there it was just this place, this coffin... and pain."

I almost broke free once: few things frighten the xenos as much as warp powers. I was close..." {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "One might consider my words heretical, but I would say it was only due to the Haemonculus who brought me here that I survived after falling in that struggle. From there it was just this place, this coffin... and pain."

languages.text: 「彼らは俺をある場所から別の場所へ何度も移動させたが、その場所が何だったかのかは分からない。霧の海で尖塔を見たり、デュカーリ船の船底を見たりした…一度脱出できそうな時があった…<歪み>後からほど異種族を怯えさせるものはない。もう少しだったのに…」{n}ハインリックスは首を振る。{/n}「俺の言葉を異端視する者もいるかもしれないが、あの闘争で倒れた俺が生きながらえたのは、ここに連れてきてくれたハモンキュラスのおかげだと言える。そこからは、この場所、この棺…そして痛みだけだった」
languages.original_text: "They moved me multiple times from one place to another, but what those places were, I cannot say. I saw spires in an ocean of mist; I saw the bowels of a Drukhari ship... I almost broke free once: few things frighten the xenos as much as warp powers. I was close..." {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "One might consider my words heretical, but I would say it was only due to the Haemonculus who brought me here that I survived after falling in that struggle. From there it was just this place, this coffin... and pain."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは俺をある場所から別の場所へ何度も移動させたが、その場所が何だったかのかは分からない。霧の海で尖塔を見たり、デュカーリ船の船底を見たりした…一度脱出できそうな時があった…<歪み>後からほど異種族を怯えさせるものはない。もう少しだったのに…」{n}ハインリックスは首を振る。{/n}「俺の言葉を異端視する者もいるかもしれないが、あの乱闘で倒れた俺が生きながらえたのは、ここに連れてきてくれたハモンキュラスのおかげだと言える。そこからは、この場所、この棺…そして痛みだけだった」

languages.text: “他们把我挪来挪去，换了好几个关押的地方，但我并不清楚那些都是什么地方。我见过迷雾之海中的尖塔，也见过黑暗灵族飞船内部……有一次，我差点就挣脱了束缚，没有什么比亚空间的力量更让那些异形恐惧的东西了。我就差那么一点点……”{n}海因里希摇了摇头。{/n}“或许我接下来的话像是异端邪说，但我被那些异形打败之后，正是因为血伶人把我带到了这里，我才活了下来。在那之后，我就一直留在这里，关在这具棺材里……忍受着痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "They moved me multiple times from one place to another, but what those places were, I cannot say. I saw spires in an ocean of mist; I saw the bowels of a Drukhari ship... I almost broke free once: few things frighten the xenos as much as warp powers. I was close..." {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "One might consider my words heretical, but I would say it was only due to the Haemonculus who brought me here that I survived after falling in that struggle. From there it was just this place, this coffin... and pain."

traits.locale_text: “他们把我挪来挪去，换了好几个关押的地方，但我并不清楚那些都是什么地方。我见过迷雾之海中的尖塔，也见过黑暗灵族飞船内部……有一次，我差点就挣脱了束缚，没有什么比亚空间的力量更让那些异形恐惧的东西了。我就差那么一点点……”{n}海因里希摇了摇头。{/n}“或许我接下来的话像是异端邪说，但我被那些异形打败之后，正是因为血伶人把我带到了这里，我才活了下来。在那之后，我就一直留在这里，关在这具棺材里……忍受着痛苦。”

languages.text: «Me trasladaron varias veces de un lugar a otro, pero no sabría decir cuáles eran. Vi agujas en un océano de niebla, vi las entrañas de una nave Drukhari... Una vez estuve a punto de liberarme: pocas cosas asustan tanto a los xenos como los poderes de la disformidad. Estuve cerca...». {n}Heinrix sacude la cabeza.{/n} «Alguien podría considerar heréticas mis palabras, pero creo que solo sobreviví gracias al Hemónculo que me trajo aquí después de aquel trance. A partir de entonces solo había este lugar, este ataúd... y el dolor».
languages.original_text: "They moved me multiple times from one place to another, but what those places were, I cannot say. I saw spires in an ocean of mist; I saw the bowels of a Drukhari ship... I almost broke free once: few things frighten the xenos as much as warp powers. I was close..." {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "One might consider my words heretical, but I would say it was only due to the Haemonculus who brought me here that I survived after falling in that struggle. From there it was just this place, this coffin... and pain."

traits.locale_text: «Me trasladaron varias veces de un lugar a otro, pero no sabría decir cuáles eran. Vi agujas en un océano de niebla, vi las entrañas de una nave Drukhari... Una vez estuve a punto de liberarme: pocas cosas asustan tanto a los xenos como los poderes de la disformidad. Estuve cerca...». {n}Heinrix sacude la cabeza.{/n} «Alguien podría considerar heréticas mis palabras, pero creo que solo sobreviví gracias al Hemónculo que me trajo aquí después de aquello. A partir de entonces solo había este lugar, este ataúd... y el dolor».

languages.text: "Sie haben mich mehrfach von einem Ort zum anderen verlegt, aber wo diese Orte waren, das vermag ich nicht zu sagen. Ich habe Türme in einem Nebelmeer gesehen, ich habe das Innere eines Drukhari-Schiffs gesehen ... Einmal habe ich mich fast befreit: Kaum etwas macht den Xenos so viel Angst wie Warp-Kräfte. Ich stand kurz davor ..." {n}Heinrix schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Man könnte meine Worte für ketzerisch halten ... doch nach meinem Sturz in diesem Ringen habe ich wohl nur wegen des Haemonculus überlebt, der mich hierher brachte. Danach gab es nur noch das hier, diesen Sarg ... und Schmerzen."
languages.original_text: "They moved me multiple times from one place to another, but what those places were, I cannot say. I saw spires in an ocean of mist; I saw the bowels of a Drukhari ship... I almost broke free once: few things frighten the xenos as much as warp powers. I was close..." {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "One might consider my words heretical, but I would say it was only due to the Haemonculus who brought me here that I survived after falling in that struggle. From there it was just this place, this coffin... and pain."

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben mich mehrfach von einem Ort zum anderen verlegt, aber wo diese Orte waren, das vermag ich nicht zu sagen. Ich habe Türme in einem Nebelmeer gesehen, ich habe das Innere eines Drukhari-Schiffs gesehen ... Einmal habe ich mich fast befreit: Kaum etwas macht den Xenos so viel Angst wie Warp-Kräfte. Ich stand kurz davor ..." {n}Heinrix schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Man könnte meine Worte für ketzerisch halten ... Doch nach meinem Sturz im Kampf habe ich wohl nur wegen des Haemonculus überlebt, der mich hergebracht hat. Danach gab es nur noch das hier, diesen Sarg ... und Schmerzen."

languages.text: « J'ai été beaucoup déplacé d'un endroit à l'autre, mais je ne saurais dire où exactement. J'ai vu des tours dans un océan de brume et les entrailles d'un vaisseau drukhari... J'ai presque réussi à m'enfuir une fois : les xénos sont semble-t-il terrifiés par les pouvoirs du Warp. J'y étais presque... {n}Heinrix secoue la tête.{/n} Je sais que ce que je vais dire frôle l'hérésie, mais je pense que si je suis encore en vie, c'est uniquement grâce à l'hémoncule qui m'a amené ici. Mais depuis, je n'ai rien connu d'autre que ce cercueil... et la souffrance. »
languages.original_text: "They moved me multiple times from one place to another, but what those places were, I cannot say. I saw spires in an ocean of mist; I saw the bowels of a Drukhari ship... I almost broke free once: few things frighten the xenos as much as warp powers. I was close..." {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "One might consider my words heretical, but I would say it was only due to the Haemonculus who brought me here that I survived after falling in that struggle. From there it was just this place, this coffin... and pain."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai été beaucoup déplacé d'un endroit à l'autre, mais je ne saurais dire où exactement. J'ai vu des tours dans un océan de brume et les entrailles d'un vaisseau drukhari... J'ai presque réussi à m'enfuir une fois : les xénos sont semble-t-il terrifiés par les pouvoirs du Warp. J'y étais presque... {n}Heinrix secoue la tête.{/n} Je sais que ce que je vais dire frôle l'hérésie, mais je pense que si je suis encore en vie, c'est uniquement grâce à l'hémoncule qui m'a amené ici. Mais depuis, je n'ai rien connu d'autre que ce cercueil... et la souffrance. »

languages.text: "Beni birkaç kez bir yerden bir başkasına taşıdılar ama nerelerden geçtiğimi bilmiyorum. Sisle kaplı bir okyanusun ortasında yükselen kulelerle bir Drukhari gemisinin içini gördüm... Bir keresinde neredeyse serbest kalmayı başarmıştım: Zenolar, en çok da öteboyut güçlerinden korkar. Çok yaklaşmıştım..." {n}Heinrix başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Bu diyeceklerime kâfirlik diyenler çıkabilir ancak o arbedede kaybettikten sonra sadece Haimonkulus beni buraya getirdiği için hayatta kalabildim. Ondan sonra kendimi burada, bu tabutta buldum... Izdırap da cabası."
languages.original_text: "They moved me multiple times from one place to another, but what those places were, I cannot say. I saw spires in an ocean of mist; I saw the bowels of a Drukhari ship... I almost broke free once: few things frighten the xenos as much as warp powers. I was close..." {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "One might consider my words heretical, but I would say it was only due to the Haemonculus who brought me here that I survived after falling in that struggle. From there it was just this place, this coffin... and pain."

traits.locale_text: "Beni birkaç kez bir yerden bir başkasına taşıdılar ama nerelerden geçtiğimi bilmiyorum. Sisle kaplı bir okyanusun ortasında yükselen kulelerle bir Drukhari gemisinin içini gördüm... Bir keresinde neredeyse serbest kalmayı başarmıştım: Zenolar, en çok da öteboyut güçlerinden korkar. Çok yaklaşmıştım..." {n}Heinrix başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Bu diyeceklerime kâfirlik diyenler çıkabilir ancak o arbedede kaybettikten sonra sadece Haimonkulus beni buraya getirdiği için hayatta kalabildim. Ondan sonra kendimi burada, bu tabutta buldum... Izdırap da cabası."
